title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Approach Landing Boeing 787
description:
In this how to we are going to look at how we can use the Boeing 787's build-in functionality to make a successful landing. We just received information from ATC about which runway is assigned to us and the first thing we are going to do is program the MCDU and make it ready for the approach and landing at Vnukovo International Airport.

tags: How to use the Boeing 787 functionalities to make a successful landing
Programming the MCDU in an 787 for approach and landing
